mptopoProtein.remarks: *The KvAP K-channel is complex. Of the 'tm segs' marked below, only tmsegs G and I are tmsegs in the usual sense. The others are associated with the pore helix and the voltage sensor domains. Using terminology from the Jiang et al. paper, the 'tmsegs' below have the following correspondence: A=S1, B=S2, C=S3a, D=S3b, E=S4, F=S4-S5 linker, G=S5, H=P, and I=S6.
